tool_description: Organizes and categorizes research notes, quotes, and findings into structured databases for easy retrieval and reference.

raw_notes.description: Raw research notes and findings to organize

organization_method.description: Organization approach: topical, chronological, source_based, thematic

categories.description: Predefined categories to organize notes into

priority_scoring.description: Add priority scores to organized notes

error_messages: Invalid organization method: Use one of [topical, chronological, source_based, thematic]
Empty raw notes: Provide at least one research note to organize
Notes limit exceeded: Maximum 200 notes allowed per organization session
Invalid note format: Each note must be a non-empty string
usage: Provide raw_notes array and optionally configure organization_method, categories, include_auto_tags, and priority_scoring. Returns organized research database.

categorized_notes.description: Notes organized by category with category labels

auto_generated_tags.description: Automatically generated tags for each note

priority_scores.description: Priority scores (1-10) for each organized note
